verses.verse: The heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5608><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of God <S%H410><s%>; and the firmament <S%H7549><s%> shows his <S%H5046><s%> handiwork <S%H4639><s%>.
Day <S%H3117><s%> unto day <S%H3117><s%> utters <S%H5042><s%> speech <S%H562><s%>, and night <S%H3915><s%> unto night <S%H3915><s%> shows <S%H2331><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
There is no speech <S%H562><s%> nor language <S%H1697><s%>, where their voice <S%H6963><s%> is not heard <S%H8085><s%>.

Their chord <S%H6957><s%> is gone out <S%H3318><s%> through all the earth <S%H776><s%>, and their words <S%H4405><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%>. In them has he set <S%H7760><s%> a tabernacle <S%H168><s%> for the sun <S%H8121><s%>,
Which is as a bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> coming out <S%H3318><s%> of his chamber <S%H2646><s%>, and rejoices <S%H7797><s%> as a strong man <S%H1368><s%> to run <S%H7323><s%> a race <S%H734><s%>.

His going forth <S%H4161><s%> is from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and his circuit <S%H8622><s%> unto the ends <S%H7098><s%> of it <S%H5641><s%>: and there is nothing hid from the heat there <S%H2535><s%>.

The law <S%H8451><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is perfect <S%H8549><s%>, converting <S%H7725><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%>: the testimony <S%H5715><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is sure <S%H539><s%>, making wise <S%H2449><s%> the simple <S%H6612><s%>.

The statutes <S%H6490><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> are right <S%H3477><s%>, rejoicing <S%H8055><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%>: the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is pure <S%H1249><s%>, enlightening <S%H215><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is clean <S%H2889><s%>, enduring <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>: the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> are true <S%H571><s%> and righteous <S%H6663><s%> altogether <S%H3162><s%>.

More to be desired <S%H2530><s%> are they than gold <S%H2091><s%>, Yes <S%H7227><s%>, than much fine gold <S%H6337><s%>: sweeter <S%H4966><s%> also than honey <S%H1706><s%> and the honeycomb <S%H5317><s%>.
Moreover by them is your servant <S%H5650><s%> warned <S%H2094><s%>: and in keeping <S%H8104><s%> of them there is great <S%H7227><s%> reward <S%H6118><s%>.
Who can understand <S%H995><s%> his errors <S%H7691><s%>? Cleanse <S%H5352><s%> me from secret faults <S%H5641><s%>.

Keep back <S%H2820><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> also from presumptuous <S%H2086><s%> sins <S%H4910><s%>; let them not have dominion over me <S%H8552><s%>: then shall I be upright, and I shall be innocent <S%H5352><s%> from the great <S%H7227><s%> transgression <S%H6588><s%>.

Let the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and the meditation <S%H1902><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%>, be acceptable <S%H7522><s%> in your sight <S%H6440><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, my strength <S%H6697><s%>, and my redeemer <S%H1350><s%>.
